
---
title: "RolePolicyAttachment"
block_external_search_index: true
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Provides a RAM Role attachment resource.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as alicloud from "@pulumi/alicloud";

// Create a RAM Role Policy attachment.
const role = new alicloud.ram.Role("role", {
    description: "this is a role test.",
    document: `    {
      "Statement": [
        {
          "Action": "sts:AssumeRole",
          "Effect": "Allow",
          "Principal": {
            "Service": [
              "apigateway.aliyuncs.com", 
              "ecs.aliyuncs.com"
            ]
          }
        }
      ],
      "Version": "1"
    }
    `,
    force: true,
});
const policy = new alicloud.ram.Policy("policy", {
    description: "this is a policy test",
    document: `  {
    "Statement": [
      {
        "Action": [
          "oss:ListObjects",
          "oss:GetObject"
        ],
        "Effect": "Allow",
        "Resource": [
          "acs:oss:*:*:mybucket",
          "acs:oss:*:*:mybucket/*"
        ]
      }
    ],
      "Version": "1"
  }
  `,
    force: true,
});
const attach = new alicloud.ram.RolePolicyAttachment("attach", {
    policyName: policy.name,
    policyType: policy.type,
    roleName: role.name,
});
```
{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

### Inputs

The RolePolicyAttachment resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Policy<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Name of the RAM policy. This name can have a string of 1 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphen "-", and must not begin with a hyphen.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Policy<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Type of the RAM policy. It must be `Custom` or `System`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Role<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Name of the RAM Role. This name can have a string of 1 to 64 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-", "_", and must not begin with a hyphen.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>

        <span>Policy<wbr>Type</span>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Type of the RAM policy. It must be `Custom` or `System`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Role<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Name of the RAM Role. This name can have a string of 1 to 64 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-", "_", and must not begin with a hyphen.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
